it.And Abu Hayyan said: It was not gathered (the earth); Because it is a vulnerable collection, and it is contrary to the measurement, and the Lord of the individual did not fall into the Qur’an.The walk is like it.Some investigators said: “The heavens”; Because it is a distinct class of each one from the other, in the same way, as it is indicated by his saying: So, they were settled by seven
